content.text: Hey!
Hey! How are you?
I'm good! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thank you!
I'm a musician and I love listening to music. What about you?
I also love music! I remember listening to Tupac in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid.
That's awesome! I also like Tupac. What's your favorite song by him?
I love all of his songs, but I think my favorite is "Changes."
That's a great song! I love the message behind it.
Me too! I think it's a really important song.
I agree. What other types of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably rap.
That's cool! I like rap too. What are some of your favorite rappers?
I like Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Tupac.
Nice! I like all of those rappers too.
They're all great!
Yeah, they are. I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
Definitely! I'm excited to talk to you more about music.
Me too! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun talking about it.
I'm sure we will
